params.fromBuild: The build number to update from.
params.thisBuild: The build number of this setup to update to.

constructor.details: The implementation address is used to deploy UUPS proxies referencing it and to verify the plugin on the respective block explorers.

implementation().details: The implementation can be instantiated via the `new` keyword, cloned via the minimal proxy pattern (see [ERC-1167](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1167)), or proxied via the UUPS proxy pattern (see [ERC-1822](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1822)).

returns._0: The address of the plugin implementation contract.

params._dao: The address of the installing DAO.
params._data: The bytes-encoded data containing the input parameters for the installation as specified in the plugin's build metadata JSON file.

returns.plugin: The address of the `Plugin` contract being prepared for installation.
returns.preparedSetupData: The deployed plugin's relevant data which consists of helpers and permissions.

params._dao: The address of the uninstalling DAO.
params._payload: The relevant data necessary for the `prepareUninstallation`. See above.

returns.permissions: The array of multi-targeted permission operations to be applied by the `PluginSetupProcessor` to the uninstalling DAO.

prepareUpdate(address,uint16,(address,ad.details: The default implementation for the initial build 1 that reverts because no earlier build exists.

params._dao: The address of the updating DAO.
params._fromBuild: The build number of the plugin to update from.
params._payload: The relevant data necessary for the `prepareUpdate`. See above.

returns._0: The initialization data to be passed to upgradeable contracts when the update is applied in the `PluginSetupProcessor`.
returns._1: The deployed plugin's relevant data which consists of helpers and permissions.

protocolVersion().details: This version number is not to be confused with the `release` and `build` numbers found in the `Version.Tag` struct inside the `PluginRepo` contract being used to version plugin setup and associated plugin implementation contracts.

returns._0: Returns the semantic Aragon OSx protocol version number.
Returns `true` if the interface is supported.

InvalidUpdatePath(uint16,uint16).notice: Thrown when an update path is not available, for example, if this is the initial build.

constructor.notice: Constructs the `PluginUpgradeableSetup` by storing the `MyPlugin` implementation address.

prepareInstallation(address,bytes).notice: Prepares the installation of a plugin.

prepareUninstallation(address,(address,a.notice: Prepares the uninstallation of a plugin.

prepareUpdate(address,uint16,(address,ad.notice: Prepares the update of a plugin.

protocolVersion().notice: Returns the semantic Aragon OSx protocol version number that the implementing contract is associated with.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Checks if this or the parent contract supports an interface by its ID.
